Package ru.fsapp.service

Class FileSystemService

java.lang.Object
ru.fsapp.service.FileSystemService
public class FileSystemService extends Object
Service for analyzing and managing file system. Provides methods for building file tree, deleting and creating files with full error handling.
Since:
2025-12-05
